title: HoneyBook
description:
HoneyBook is the leading clientflow management platform helping independent business owners to sell and deliver their series easily online. By combining essential business tools for client communication, proposals, invoices, payments, and more, all in one place, HoneyBook makes it easier to run a professional, organized independent business. 

Over 100,000 businesses in the U.S. Canada trust HoneyBook to book clients, manage projects, and get paid.
